description:
Are you in control of stress or does stress control you? Do you believe work life balance is an illusion? Well you are in the right place! Course updated March 28, 2016.

Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days is for you if:

  • You struggle with competing stress inducing priorities and you feel less than good enough at any of them which is impacting you in every area of your life
  • You work in a career or business that demands more of your "after-work" time and you fear saying no or setting boundaries because you need the income
  • You are living a chaotic stress-filled life just to stay one step ahead
  • You can’t remember the last time you enjoyed going to work and it’s impacting your home life
  • You started a business to have more freedom but you have less time and more stress
  • You secretly just want to escape to an island where no one can find you

******************************************************************************************************************

Why Join Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days?

This is why you are here because you want to finally master stress so you can live a successful life and be your best without burning out!

You want to be a high achiever and experience your full potential in your career or business but not at the cost of losing your children, spouse or health.

Now keep this in mind. Every piece of advice, strategy and logical approach to stress management mastery and work life balance bliss has been tested; none of this is theory.

In fact, this comprehensive course is step-by-step and gives you 2 stress management plans; one 7 day quick-fix power program and one 30 day advanced program.

You discover exact stress management strategies that are easy and work so you stop wasting time and money doing the wrong things.

What is covered in Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days?

  1. Develop yourself into your personal and professional best without adding more stress
  2. Learn a 7 day power program that equips you with simple yet effective daily stress management strategies
  3. Feel more empowered and less anxious when walking into difficult stressful situations
  4. Create a work life balance solution for your personal life, relationships, health, career/business, money, finances and life purpose.
  5. Uncover your unique stress storm and build a work life balance step-by-step empowerment action plan
  6. Be more respected as a career professional or business owner as you learn to be powerfully poised in stressful situations
  7. Go from frazzled mind to peace-of-mind regardless of the stress and chaos that surrounds you.
  8. Be a better parent because you will identify your top stress coping mechanisms and be guided through an eye-opening process that uncovers the underlying cause of your stress.
  9. Feel less overwhelmed and be more productive because you learn to quickly identify the signs of stress and apply our one-of-a-kind stress reduction techniques so you relieve stress plus regain control in every area of your life
  10. Experience more fulfilling relationships because you finish the course feeling more confident, more powerful with a greater ability to communicate.
  11. Improve your self-esteem and confidence.
  12. Become unstoppable in your personal and professional life with our "rinse and repeat" 30 day stress to success plan that is easy to follow and implement.

******************************************************************************************************************

How will Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days Benefit You?

Stress consumed me when I worked as a teacher and a financial professional. But the feelings got worse when I became self-employed. I was so stressed-out feeling torn between so many competing commitments that it was affecting my health, my bank account and my happiness.

I turned stress into success using the same strategies I share in this ground-breaking course.

I show you how to balance work and life and actually live with less-stress while becoming your best in every area of your life.

The masculine approach to success doesn't work for women and men and in this course you discover my step-by-step approach I have used with personal coaching clients.

When you finish the course you walk away with a simple 7 Day Work Life Balance Bliss Power Program that is easy to implement and gives you instant stress relief.

Plus you get my 30 Day Stressed to Success Advance Program. You walk away with a long-term personal and professional development strategy that empowers you to succeed in every area of your life the care-free relaxed way. Now that is stress management mastery!

When Can You Take Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days?

What are you waiting for? If you’re looking for a course to learn how to balance work and life so you can live more, earn more and be more the stress-less easy way, then look no further.

Start learning right now or take the course when it is convenient for you! The course can be accessed 24-7 from most devices with an internet connection.

Once a member of the course, you receive lecture updates, advice and coaching guidance for life; NO EXTRA COST TO YOU.

REMEMBER: If you are not completely satisfied, you can get a full money back refund, so long as you request it within 30 days of purchase – No questions asked.

Click on the "Take This Course" button and start learning instantly

Still not convinced? Make sure you watch some of the FREE PREVIEWS available to learn more about the course and more about me your instructor. Here is what a recent reviewer of the new updated course had to say:

Here is what people are saying about Stress Management Mastery: Work Life Balance Bliss in 7 Days created by Louise Anne Maurice of Womanly Wealth Academy:

“Fun Stress Management Course - Louise has such great energy that you feel good just watching her lectures. The hands-on activities in the 7 day power program were so much fun – I felt instant stress relief and more alive. I plan on coming back many times just to go through the power program. I am working through the 30 day advanced program and look forward to using her “empower formula” so I show up differently in work and life. Excellent personal and professional development program as well!”

***************************************************************************************************************
title: Stress Management Mastery Work Life Balance Bliss in 7Days
instructors: Womanly Wealth Academy, Louise Anne Maurice
